attributes.review: So I downloaded this system right, but what my ignorante mind thought was a innocent app turned out to be something horrifying. >> I was minding my own business scrolling through tik tok ,watching Charlie Dâ€™Amelio and Bob Ross throw it back, when lil green FBI ALIENS sent me a message. I was so frightened i peed an ocean !! I asked them how they found me and they said that THIS app gave them my location and place . You know how detailed your address and info has to be for LIL FBI ALIENS from the Milky Way to find you ? I didnâ€™t even know FBI was a universal thing . ( the more you know ) I was devastated and with worry I asked them what they wanted . They told me they wanted me to get on a rocket to go collect dirt or ice from every planet EVER . If I failed their mission I was Doomed for life !!  I  desperately looked for a way out ,but when none where found i knew what I had to do.  I spent the following hours building a lil red rocket to do just that and it worked!! However, when I came back with everything those pesky lil aliens ever WANTED I was horrified to hear their plan . THEY WANTED TO MAKE DONALD TRUMP A CROWN WITH ALL THIS PLANET STUFF TO MAKE HIM KING OF ALL CREATION!! I didnâ€™t believe my ears and I couldnâ€™t believe I fell for that . Why did I listen to lil FBI aliens !! My body started getting hot and I was fueled with angerrrr when I woke up . Turns out it was just a Nightmare , but I think itâ€™s enough to hate this app . Haha jkjk itâ€™s a joke. :) ITS A JOKE
